TABLE.NAME: tool_trigger_workflows
TABLE.COMMENT: Workflows for the Trigger administration tool

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of this workflow

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of the workflow

FIELD.NAME: event
FIELD.COMMENT: event name associated with this workflow

FIELD.NAME: async
FIELD.COMMENT: True if this is an asynchronous event

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: is this workflow enabled

FIELD.NAME: draft
FIELD.COMMENT: Is this workflow in draft mode

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when this workflow was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when this workflow was last modified

FIELD.NAME: timetriggered
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the workflow was last triggered

TABLE.NAME: tool_trigger_queue
TABLE.COMMENT: Queue of workflow tasks to be processed.

FIELD.NAME: workflowid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the workflow this queue item relates to

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Status of processing. 0 pending, 1, processed, -1 failed

FIELD.NAME: tries
FIELD.COMMENT: number of times this item has attempted to be processed

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp this item was added to the queue

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time this item was last modifief

KEY.NAME: workflowid
KEY.COMMENT: foreign key relates to id in workflow table

TABLE.NAME: tool_trigger_steps
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to store data about individual steps in a workflow.

FIELD.NAME: workflowid
FIELD.COMMENT: The workflow ID this step relates to.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name of the step

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: Description of the step

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of the step

FIELD.NAME: stepclass
FIELD.COMMENT: the class path for the step

FIELD.NAME: data
FIELD.COMMENT: The JSON data for the step.

FIELD.NAME: steporder
FIELD.COMMENT: The steps order in the workflow processing

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the step was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the step was last modified

TABLE.NAME: tool_trigger_events
TABLE.COMMENT: A table that keeps a log of events related to workflows

FIELD.NAME: eventname
FIELD.COMMENT: Event name

FIELD.NAME: contextid
FIELD.COMMENT: Context id

FIELD.NAME: contextlevel
FIELD.COMMENT: Context level

FIELD.NAME: contextinstanceid
FIELD.COMMENT: Context instance id

FIELD.NAME: link
FIELD.COMMENT: Link to the event location

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: course id

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time created
